author: andschwa
body: This skips the slow Pester tests for Linux / OS X. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1011)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Between this and #1004, the Linux build now runs in 5 minutes, with the Pester tests running in 42 seconds instead of 99.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Note, AppVeyor still runs them (on purpose).

title: Skip slow Pester tests
